def.dt: :a line that marks the outer limits of an object or figure :boundary
:a style of drawing in which contours are marked without shading
:a condensed treatment of a particular subject an outline of world history

entry.pt: outline contour profile silhouette mean the line that bounds and gives form to something. outline applies to a line marking the outer limits or edges of a body or mass traced the outline of his hand. contour stresses the quality of an outline or a bounding surface as being smooth, jagged, curving, or sharply angled a car with flowing contours. profile suggests a varied and sharply defined outline against a lighter background a portrait of her face in profile. silhouette suggests a shape especially of a head or figure with all detail blacked out in shadow leaving only the outline clearly defined photograph in silhouette against a bright sky.

def.dt: :to indicate the principal features or different parts of outlined their responsibilities
